Detailed Description

This file contains C wrapper functions for system calls.

The wrappers are used by user programs to perform system calls from C.

Definition in file scwrapper.h.

Function Documentation

static long alloc ( unsigned long  length,
int  flags 
) [inline, static]

Wrapper for the system call that allocates a memory block.

Parameters:
length integer holding the number of bytes to allocate
flags integer holding the type of memory block to allocate
